perfusion_sqi.name: Perfusion
perfusion_sqi.desc: The gold standard for assessment of PPG signal quality in industrial pulse oximeters. Defined as the ratio of the pulsatile (AC) part of the waveform to the static (DC) part of the waveform

skewness_base_sqi.name: Skewness
skewness_base_sqi.desc: A statistical measure of the symmetry (or the lack of it) in the analysed signal

kurtosis_base_sqi.name: Kurtosis
kurtosis_base_sqi.desc: A statistical measure of the analysed signal around mean compared to normal distribution

entropy_base_sqi.name: Entropy
entropy_base_sqi.desc: A staistical measure that quantifies the different between probability density functions of analysed signal and uniform distribution.

zero_crossings_sqi.name: Zero crossing rate
zero_crossings_sqi.desc: A rate of how often the signal crosses the zero (switches between positive and negative value)

snr_sqi.name: Signal-to-noise ratio
snr_sqi.desc: In this case, SNR is defined as the ratio between the analysed signal variance and its noise variance

msq_sqi.name: Matching of multiple systolic wave detection algorithms
msq_sqi.desc: A measure of agreement between two different peak detection algorithms used on the analysed signal

relative_power_sqi.name: Relative power
relative_power_sqi.desc: The ratio between power spectral density within the frequency band of interest (1-2.25Hz) and the whole signal (0-8Hz)

acf_sqi.name: Auto-correlation based signal quality indices
acf_sqi.desc: Signal quality indices extracted from the correlogram computed by autcorrelation of the analysed signal

dtw_sqi.name: Dynamic time warping
dtw_sqi.desc: Compute correlation between a template signal and the analysed signal using dynamic type warping
